issue.title: [CF 176] Group Conditions
issue.body:
This one is pretty obvious: Allow entire groups to have conditions in addition to individual icons.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #176 | Raw

comments.body:
Consider merging existing group options (combat, vehicle) into group conditions. Stances would be a little hard without adding like 6 conditions per group, and the current method is more efficient (although it won't be by much if I do this right)


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
